claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a page from the full prescribing information for Flublok (Influenza Vaccine) for intramuscular use (2024–2025 formula). Under the “INDICATIONS AND USAGE” section, it states: “Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older.” This directly confirms the claim that Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older.
